name: The Chickens Are Out Of Control!
name_original: The Chickens Are Out Of Control!
description:
Uh Oh! The chickens are in danger! Good thing the aliens showed up! Keep them away from harm long enough for the aliens to abduct them and get them to safety! Be careful, because once 3 chickens are killed, you're out!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, following the theme "Out Of Control".

_________________________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY:

Uh oh! The chickens are loose! Thank goodness the aliens are here to help!

Drag and drop the chickens to move them away from the saws.

If a chicken is kept alive long enough, the aliens will abduct it, saving it from a violent death!

Be careful, because once 3 chickens are killed, you’re out!

Now go save those chickens!

_________________________________________________________________________
